column5: Was out Bass fishing with 24/7 yesterday, looks like this dude was on the Run !!     We did manage to jig up some Smallies from a depth of 40 feet
Nice buck    Looks more like an 11 pointer to me   Must of been a little chilly out on the water yesterday   Up where I was, temps was -3C with a north westerly gusting at 25KM/H Nice bunch of bronze
Yep, looks like eleven point or onze point.
wow !!! awesome fall smallies,and man what an amazing big buck !!! looks like an 11pointer !!!

That fella is just heading over to check out the ladies on the other side of the pond.  Only happens once a year!  Nice smllies!  Curious, did you have to fizz before they went in the well after coming up from 40ft?
Need to get one of those Hypo needles ????............or just leave them in the water when unhooking them.But yeah !! we had the darnest time trying to get them to swim down afterwards

Sorry, I do not mean to sway the direction of this thread and turn it about fizzing.  However, if you are planning on fishing deep often, you may want to look into it.  Short on time to write about fizzing now, but a search will pull up lots of good info including how to and pro/cons.  Not my intent again, sorry.

defenetly going to learn to fizz.  just started to fish in the deep.  not a minute to soon to learn new things about fishing!  guys posted some great links and video's  now just have to catch more and practice.  :Gonefishing:
Kevin always thought that fizzing was a drinking game..........great fish  :worthy:
